claim: % growth in foreign tourism in QueretaroMost international visitors are American nationals, as well as from Germany and Spain. During , the state of Queretaro registered 1,000  foreign visitors, which meant an increase of  percent over the previous year, said the Secretary of Tourism (Sectur) in the entity Hugo Burgos García. He indicated that the majority of international tourists are of American nationality, as well as of Germany and Spain, mainly. In total, two million  thousand visitors were received in the state last year, he added. In a press conference, Burgos García announced, together with representatives of the Irish Embassy in Mexico, the presentation of the traditional music group 'Green Fields of America ', which will be held this Saturday  March in the state capital. In the context of the announcement, the secretary commented that the authorities of Tourism in the state have undertaken different actions to promote and increase the influx of visitors in the entity, also taking advantage of the connections and other destinations that exist in the country and abroad. In the case of Ireland, for example, he recalled that from the beginning of this administration, work began with tour operators who already tourists from the European country, seeking the possibility of generating a flow of Irish visitors to Queretaro from destinations like Cancun. 'There are many people who come to Queretaro, and those connections are the ones that allow us to sell the destination through them ', Burgos mentioned. 'We are working on identifying the places of origin of tourists in a clearer way. '. For this year, we will work with tour operators, as well as with the authorities of the Tourist Promotion Council of Mexico, to attract also wholesale companies, which are the ones that can invest the most in projects in Queretaro. For his part, David Costello, representative of the Embassy of Ireland in Mexico, highlighted the cultural and historical similarities, as well as the industrial, economic and tourist coincidences that exist between the European nation and Queretaro. On the other hand, Burgos mentioned that they are waiting for this week the Federal Tourism Secretariat to authorize the resources for the support of the  development projects in the state, for an approximate amount of  million pesos. I'm sorry.
